p: Results from Klimaszewska et al. [ 32] suggest that KN1 and KN2 can be used as markers during the initial steps of SE for the discrimination of EMs from non-embryogenic calli. This is not the case of KN3, which showed high expression in non-embryogenic calli in Picea glauca. However, KN3 and KN4 orthologues might constitute good markers for the maturation competence of embryogenic lines [ 116].
